title: BLOCK BY BLOCK: BUILDING CARDANO'S FUTURE IN VIETNAM
summary: Critical mass in Vietnam: a shortage of skilled local developers and limited pipeline of high-potential DeFi projects. This deficiency severely constrains market share and essential ecosystem utility
solution: Implement a 6-month Awareness-Ideation-Building-Incubation strategy to directly solve the shortage of developers and products, while accelerating the strong growth of the Cardano ecosystem in Vietnam
proposer_relevant_experience:
**1\. Hanna Nguyen \- Labs Manager, SCI Labs**

- 5+ years of lead experience in the blockchain industry
- 3+ years of incubation programs
- Success in incubating 6 projects in 2 years, and 3 of them successfully in creating revenue and a 4.stable community
- Advisor for Growth and Marketing Strategy
- X: https://x.com/Hanna_SCI

**2\. Kurt Nguyen \- Growth Manager, SCI Labs**

- 4+ years of experience in the blockchain industry
- 2+ years of fintech experience in Japan
- Founder of Phuoc Bau Community ( 1 of 10 top Crypto Communities in VN with 12,000+ users)
- Researcher in Defi ( especially in LSDfi, RWAs, stablecoin analysis)
- X: [https://x\.com/kurtfortrade](https://x.com/kurtfortrade)
- LinkedIn: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/giang\-nguyen\-184257188/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/giang-nguyen-184257188/)

**3\. Cindy Nguyen \- Marketing Executive, SCI Labs**

- 2+ years of experience in marketing and community management within the blockchain industry.
- Experienced in managing and growing social media channels (Facebook, X, Telegram) for SCI Labs and its incubated projects, reaching a combined audience of 1,000+ followers.
- Built and maintained the VNST community (an incubated project of SCI Labs) with 900+ MAU through consistent brand communication and performance tracking.
- LinkedIn: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/minhchaunguyen16/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/minhchaunguyen16/)

**4\. Mina Ngo \- Business Development Executive, SCI Labs**

- 2+ years in business development and partnership in blockchain, community and CEX
- Involved in the organization of 4+ blockchain hackathons
- Strong understanding of hackathon dynamics, onboarding pipelines, prize design, judging frameworks and post-event conversion
- Demonstrated ability to connect builders with investors, technical advisors and ecosystem stakeholders
- LinkedIn: [http://linkedin\.com/in/minh\-phuong\-1274171a3](http://linkedin.com/in/minh-phuong-1274171a3)

**5\. James Ha \- Growth Manager, Sky3Team**

- **5\+ years of experience in the blockchain industry**
- Founder and advisor for 10+ Web3 projects across DeFi, NFTs, and infrastructure
- Twitter (X): [https://x\.com/James\_Sky3team](https://x.com/James_Sky3team)

**6\. Amy Doan \- Partnership Manager, Sky3Team**

- 4+ years in business development & partnership management in blockchain, NFT and GameFi
- Proven experience cultivating partnerships with KOLs, influencers, and strategic partners
- Led partnership initiatives at Icetea Labs/GameFi.org, SkyChain Capital and Junction Vietnam
- Linkedin: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/amy\-doan\-430910216/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/amy-doan-430910216/)

**7\. Mia Vu \- Event Coordinator, Sky3Team**

- 2+ years of experience organizing tech and Web3 events across Vietnam, including large conferences, community meetups, and builder-focused workshops.

- Skilled in venue coordination, agenda planning, partner/sponsor onboarding, and on-site operations.
- Linkedin: [https://www\.linkedin\.com/in/hatvu2010/](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hatvu2010/)

**8\. Mio Nguyen \- Marketing Executive, Sky3Team**

- 2+ years of experience in marketing strategy and execution, with a focus on blockchain and emerging technologies.
- Managed end-to-end marketing campaigns for Web3 events, increasing participant turnout by 30% through targeted outreach.
- Skilled in digital marketing channels (social media, content marketing, paid ads) and partnership development with tech hubs and media.
- Strong track record in community growth, successfully scaling online communities to 5,000+ active members.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
**1\. Who we target:**

- **Vietnamese Developers/Builders** (focused on DeFi/FinTech). **Tech Students and Academia** (Hanoi, HCMC, Da Nang). **Early Adopters/Users** interested in the payment and privacy frame and Perp Dex solution. **Existing Cardano Community** in Vietnam and SEA.

**2\. How we reach them:**

- A continuous pipeline of activities: **Awareness\-Ideation\-Building\-Incubation**
- Leverage SCI Labs and Sky3team's massive digital reach 

       + Workshops, AMAs, demo days, mentorship sessions, and community events. 

       + Partnerships with Cardano Foundation, Catalyst, Student Finance or Technique clubs, and Local Dev Communities.

       + Multi-channel communication through social platforms and tech communities.

**3\. Why this matters for Cardano**

- **Solves the Talent Gap**: Creates 20-30 skilled Cardano developers, building a long-term foundation.
- Builds a **sustainable pipeline of real projects** for the Cardano ecosystem.
- Expands the **Vietnam Cardano developer community**, a high-growth region.
- Increases adoption through practical, impact-driven products.
- Enhances developer skills and ecosystem knowledge through structured training and mentorship.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
1. **Incubation Program**: Provide follow-up support in incubation programs, including:

- Workspace: Provision of coworking spaces, meeting rooms, and essential facilities for teams to work and conduct demos.
- Marketing & Promotion: Assistance with branding, project PR, and facilitating connections with the community and potential investors.
- Funding: Support for operational costs, guidance on applying for Catalyst/grants, and investor matchmaking.
- Networking & Mentorship: Direct access to mentors and veteran builders for product feedback, beta testing, and strategic networking.



2. **Hackathon Organization \(Main Event\)**: Plan, execute, and manage the national-scale hackathon.



3. **Developer Training & Workshops**: Conduct hands-on technical workshops to train developers on building on Cardano.



4. **Community Outreach & Onboarding**: Organize meetups and digital campaigns to onboard new users to experience Cardano and blockchain.



5. **Content Creation & IP Sharing**: Develop presentations, demos, and educational materials and produce open-source documentation

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
- Developer Pipeline: 20-30 newly trained developers on Cardano.
- Hackathon Scale: 50+ teams/projects participating.
- User Adoption: 500+ new users onboarded to experience Cardano ecosystem.
- Community Reach: 100,000+ social reach.
- Ecosystem Validation: Establish new partnerships with local universities/tech organizations, particularly in Da Nang's sandbox area.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
**1\. Viet Nam overview: **

Vietnam is emerging as one of Asia’s growing hubs for blockchain talent, creating strong potential for Web3 development. However, the shortage of developers and the lack of a high-quality DeFi/FinTech project pipeline remain key challenges that must be addressed for Cardano to fully capture this opportunity and expand its ecosystem utility and market presence.

Across Asia, the developer base is expanding rapidly. The 2024 Electric Capital Developer Report finds Asia now leads the world by share of crypto developers, with 41% newcomers entering Web3 in 2024.

![](https://cdn.hstatic.net/files/200001096509/file/screenshot_2025-11-25_145323.png)

Source: The 2024 Electric Capital Developer Report

Vietnam has emerged as a Southeast Asian tech hub with around 560,000 professionals in computer science and IT-related sectors and 55,000–60,000 students enrolling in IT majors each year.

On the demand side, Vietnam exhibits persistently high user adoption of crypto. Chainalysis’s 2024 Global Crypto Adoption Index places Vietnam in the top five worldwide, indicating a deep base of motivated users and prospective builders who can be activated through localized onboarding and Vietnamese-language materials.

![](https://cdn.hstatic.net/files/200001096509/file/screenshot_2025-11-25_145545.png)

Source: The 2024 Global Crypto Adoption Index - Chainalysis

On the Cardano ecosystem side, Cardano’s developer base remains active and growing, open-source activity across crypto is at an all-time high: the Electric Capital “Monthly commits” series shows a multi-year uptrend with a new peak approaching 30k commits/month in 2025 - evidence of expanding supply on the builder side.

![](https://cdn.hstatic.net/files/200001096509/file/screenshot_2025-11-25_150039.png)

Source: Developer Report by Electric Capital



**2\. Problem Statement:**

The core challenge facing the Cardano community in Vietnam is the critical shortage of skilled core developers and a limited pipeline of high-potential DeFi/FinTech projects. This deficiency severely constrains market share and essential ecosystem utility.

- Developer Gap: Despite Vietnam's vast pool of general technical engineers, the number of Cardano Developers formally trained in Plutus/Marlowe is currently very low. This creates a significant barrier to building complex, core applications on Cardano, limiting market competitiveness and ecosystem utility. 
- The Product and Utility Gap: The talent shortage results in an ineffective project pipeline for high-quality DeFi/FinTech products (such as payment, privacy, and Perpetual DEX solutions). This prevents Cardano from capturing significant market share in one of Asia's fastest-growing consumer and technology markets.



**3\. Solution: THE AIBI \(AWARENESS \- IDEATION \- BUILDING \- INCUBATION\) STRATEGY**



We propose a comprehensive, 6-month, structured ecosystem development strategy called the AIBI Pipeline (Awareness-Ideation-Building-Incubation). This strategy is specifically designed to convert Vietnam's vast technical talent into high-quality Cardano builders, directly addressing the critical shortage of skilled developers and viable DeFi projects.



This structured approach directly solves the two core problems identified above:

![](https://cdn.hstatic.net/files/200001096509/file/screenshot_2025-11-25_150128.png)



**4\. Strategic Framework:**

- Incubation Program & Follow-up Support: Offer working space,  funds, marketing and promotion, networking and mentor guidance ensuring teams can develop sustainable prototypes and advance toward hackathon.
- Awareness & Education (Months 1-2): Launch targeted workshops for university students covering Cardano 101, Plutus, and Marlowe, with the goal of building a strong foundational knowledge base for future developers and blockchain builders.
- Ideation & Building Catalyst (Months 3-4): Initiate a Cardano Ideathon followed by the centerpiece event: the Cardano Hackathon (2-3 days). This will act as a funnel to drive 25+ teams centered on high-demand areas: payment, privacy, and DeFi on Cardano.
- Hackathon kick-off and Technical Bootcamp (Month 5): Run Cardano Hackathon by utilizing the combined hybrid model for maximum reach and focused development, supported by intensive mentorship from Core Developers and Cardano. Focus on 25+ high-potential projects. 
- Demo Day and Report: Select and support the most promising teams for Demo Days. Do an overall report and Community impact video with activity results summary and metrics: number of participants, ideas generated, pilot projects, and video recap.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
This initiative creates positive impacts that extend far beyond the Vietnamese market, establishing a framework for institutional adoption globally.

- **Talent Pipeline &** IP Generation: Directly yields 20-30 new Cardano-skilled developers and seeds the ecosystem with 2-3 commercially viable DeFi/FinTech applications, enhancing the global technical repository.
- Adoption and Utility Validation: The successful onboarding of 500+ new users provides verifiable, on-chain proof of Cardano's real-world utility and adoption within a high-growth consumer market.
- Strategic Market Access: Establishing a strong presence in the Da Nang tech hub positions Cardano to engage with favorable regulatory environments (sandbox), creating templates for regulatory navigation applicable to other developed economies.
- Knowledge Transfer & Open Source IP: All successful methodologies, training materials, and implementation processes will be documented and released as open-source playbooks, allowing other global communities to replicate the successful growth model.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
1. **Proven Execution at Scale**

**Track:**

- Successfully managed and delivered 4 major hackathons, engaging 100+ teams and 500 total participants.
- Regularly hosts 8 builder meetups and events with 1000+ participants total
- Build community, educate technical, blockchain, and finance communities with 300k+ YouTube followers.
- Operational expertise in event management, communication planning, and community engagement.
- Pitchdeck SCI Labs: [https://drive\.google\.com/file/d/1P5YCeswLwbJqm1brRoMAQ4S4GNC73MlI/view](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P5YCeswLwbJqm1brRoMAQ4S4GNC73MlI/view)
- [https://docsend\.com/v/bdmcd/sky3team\_proposal](https://docsend.com/v/bdmcd/sky3team_proposal)

**Validate feasibility:**

- The project's goals (30 teams, 20-30 devs) are conservative scaling from proven baseline metrics, eliminating execution risk associated with new ventures.

**2\.  Incubation support Commitment**

**Track**:

- Successfully incubated 5 projects, providing dedicated external support Go to go-to-market strategy, working space, advisor, and funding packages ranging about $100,000 USD/project/year.

**Validate feasibility**:

- Co-Build Model: Our commitment to support projects participating in hackathons and ideathons following incubation programs. That ensures the project can finish projects, generating significant leverage

**3\.  Infrastructure and Team**

**Track**:

- Controls and utilizes 2 working spaces. Key personnel have a history of successful, transparent community and development work with Strong connections with mentors, technical experts, and the Cardano APAC ecosystem

**Validate feasibility**:

- Resource Adequacy: The existing infrastructure and full-time team capacity ensure logistical security for all events and training programs..

sub_fields.title: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.description: How does the cost of the project represent value for the Cardano ecosystem?
sub_fields.answer:
60,000 ADA requested for this project represents not merely a cost, but a strategic, leveraged investment that delivers exceptional, multi-dimensional value to the Cardano ecosystem. Our cost-effectiveness is validated by our proven execution history and a robust co-investment model, resulting in sustainable growth and high ROI metrics.



**1\. Strategic Co\-Investment and Long\-Term Commitment**

Our commitment ensures this project is a true community co-funding initiative, not a standalone grant request:

- Internal Financial Dedication: SCI Labs maintains high, ongoing operational costs, including salaries and core community activities, estimated at $100,000 USD annually. This requested Cardano fund supplements these existing long-term investments, specifically targeting the high-leverage, scalable activities (Hackathon, Dev Training, Da Nang outreach) that require immediate capital injection.
- Shared Ecosystem Responsibility: By requesting this fund, SCI Labs seeks to partner with the Cardano community to share the financial responsibility for key ecosystem growth. We are committing our existing $100k annual operational budget and our $100k incubation fund to the long-term success of the projects, asking the Cardano community to contribute only the necessary capital to scale the activation events.
- Financial Multiplier: By focusing on event logistics and builder incentives, SCI Labs ensures that every ADA contributed is amplified through SCI Labs’ existing annual operational budget. This approach delivers returns far greater than what a fully self-funded project could achieve.



**2\. Strategic Market Access and Sustainable Growth**

The project ensures the funds deliver long-term, strategic value by anchoring Cardano in a crucial market:

- Cardano Market Anchor in Vietnam: With SCI Labs community network ( and a stable $100k annual operational base, we provide Cardano with an immediate and scalable presence in one of Asia’s fastest-growing tech ecosystems.
- Strategic Positioning in Da Nang: By operating in Da Nang—an emerging sandbox for digital and regulatory innovation—we secure a first-mover advantage and produce replicable frameworks for enterprise adoption and government alignment across the wider region.
- Reusable Open-Source Playbooks: All event processes and methodologies will be published as open-source assets, empowering Cardano communities worldwide to replicate successful growth models and accelerate ecosystem expansion efficiently.



Conclusion: The 60,000 ADA investment is more than event funding—it is a high-impact strategic partnership. It enables the Cardano community to amplify SCI Labs’ proven pipeline, unlocking significant returns in builder talent, real products, and long-term market positioning.

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal is a non-technical initiative, with ≤20% of the budget for tech support.
sub_fields.description: Scope Fit:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal provides verifiable evidence (portfolio, links, reports) of the team's ability to deliver the project.
sub_fields.description: Relevant Experience:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposer and all team members are in good standing with prior Catalyst projects.
sub_fields.description: Catalyst Standing:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal includes clear objectives with both Output Metrics (what proposal did) and Adoption-Focused Metrics (what effect proposal had).
sub_fields.description: Clear Goals & KPIs:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal clearly explains the user journey and provides a credible plan for how the project will equip and motivate users for future on-chain activity.
sub_fields.description: Pathway to Adoption:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the initiative clearly demonstrates how it will grow the Cardano ecosystem or onboard users.
sub_fields.description: Community Value:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the project plan and timeline (≤ 12 months) are realistic and well-defined.
sub_fields.description: Realistic Timeline:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the proposal commits to public outputs and justifies any exceptions.
sub_fields.description: Public Outputs:

sub_fields.title: I confirm that the budget adheres to all policies: it is for future work, follows the merchandise rule, and excludes establishing local treasuries, incentives/giveaways, re-grants.
sub_fields.description: Budget Compliance:

sub_fields.title: I Agree
sub_fields.description: I confirm that I have read, understand and shall adhere to the [Project Catalyst Platform Terms of Use](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-terms-of-use), [Project Catalyst Platform Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/project-catalyst-platform-privacy-policy), [Terms & Conditions](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions), [Fund Rules](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/fund-rules), [Privacy Policy](https://docs.projectcatalyst.io/current-fund/fund-basics/project-catalyst-terms-and-conditions/catalyst-fc-privacy-policy). I understand that providing accurate and truthful information is essential for my proposal to remain eligible to participate in the current Fund.
